enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve manipulation of the reasonPhrase field, making setReasonPhrase a natural precursor to getReasonPhrase.
Setting the error code can influence the reason phrase, especially if the reason phrase is derived from the error code.
Both methods return a reason phrase related to an error code, making getDefaultReasonPhrase a good reference for expected outputs in tests.
The equals method compares the reason phrase, making it a useful reference for asserting the correctness of the reason phrase.
